Package org.middleheaven.crypto

Cipher utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CipherAlgorithm Main contract for a cipher algorithm
RevertableCipherAlgorithm Represents and CipherAlgorithm that can be reverted, i.e. deciphered.
 

Class Summary
Base64CipherAlgorithm Provides Base64 encryption.
CompositeCipherAlgorithm Allows for several algorithm to be chain together to produce another cipher algorithm.
HexCipherAlgorithm  
MD5Base64CipherAlgorithm  
MD5CipherAlgorithm Simple wrapper around java.security.MessageDigest for MD5 encription
MD5HexCipherAlgorithm  
 

Exception Summary
Base64DecodingException  
CipherException Layer exception for any cipher algorithm problems.
NoSuchAlgorithmCipherException  
 

Package org.middleheaven.crypto Description

Cipher utilities. For now simple MD5 and Base64 are implemented This is not intended to be a cryptography library, just a encapsulation point for abstracting the real libraries underneath.
